Race.Name: Eladrin Chaosmancer
Race.Description: Wild magic is my only friend. An Eladrin wild mage who causes chaos where they roam.

Feat.Name: Wildmagic Fey
Feat.Description: Your fey nature touchs all your spells with wildmagic. Wildmagic - When you cast spells, you have a small chance to have additional strange effects occur around you. These effects vary greatly from helpful, dangerous to just silly. Grants a 5% chance os a Wildsurge every time you cast. Wildsurges do not occur in public spaces.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Eladrin Chaosmancer
Feat.Description:
Iconic Past Life Stance: Fey Step: Disappear and reappear several feet in front of you. You have maximum charges equal to your number of Eladrin Wild Mage past lives.
Passive Bonus: +3 Universal Spell Power per stack of this past life. This feat can be stacked up to three times.
